metadata.title: CVE-2019-17007 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Network Security Services before 3.44, a malformed Netscape CertificateSequence can cause NSS to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17007` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss3 - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.6
libnss3-tools - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nss package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.35-2ubuntu2.6').
